ardrive.title: What is ArDrive?
ardrive.description1: ArDrive is a decentralized storage platform built on the Arweave blockchain. Unlike traditional cloud storage, files stored on ArDrive are permanently saved on the Arweave network, creating truly permanent data storage.
ardrive.description2: This means all the avatar files will be available forever - they can't be deleted, censored, or taken offline. The one-time storage fee ensures perpetual access without subscription costs, making it ideal for preserving open source content like these avatars.

vrm.title: About VRM Format
vrm.description: All avatars in this collection are primarily available in VRM format, with some also offered in alternative formats.

what.title: What is VRM?
what.description1: VRM is an open file format for 3D humanoid avatars used in VR applications. Based on glTF, it extends the format with humanoid skeletal structure, material definitions for various rendering styles, facial expressions, and look-at controls.
what.description2: We use VRM because it's an open, standardized format that works across multiple platforms including VRChat, VTuber applications, web browsers, Unity, and other 3D engines. It has excellent support for humanoid avatars and includes built-in rigging that makes animation straightforward.
what.learnMore: Learn more about VRM at the official website

philosophy.title: Our Open Source Philosophy
philosophy.description: We believe in the power of open source to drive innovation and creativity in the virtual world.

goals.intro: By making these avatars freely available under permissive licenses (primarily CC0), we aim to:
list: Lower the barrier to entry for creators new to virtual worlds
Provide high-quality reference materials for learning
Build a more diverse and inclusive representation of characters in virtual spaces

philosophy.description1: The metaverse should be built on open standards and shared creative resources, not locked behind proprietary formats and restrictive licenses. Our avatars can be freely modified, remixed, and used in both personal and commercial projects.
philosophy.description2: Feel free to use these avatars for your website, game, artwork, training an LLM or AI model, or pretty much whatever you want. There are no restrictions - that's the beauty of truly open content.
philosophy.description3: We encourage others to join this movement by sharing their own creations under similar open licenses.
